name: Wardens
description:
The customizable board game with card battler elements

Become the creator in this board game with card battler elements. Craft your own units with unique abilities and decide what they look like. They can then easily be shared and tried out by others. Tired of frequently paying for new card packs, just to stay competitive and enjoy fresh content? Once you own the game, both official and user generated card packs can be accessed at no additional cost.


What can be created?

You can create units and customize their name, movement style, portrait and abilities. Abilities are created with our unique in-game editor and allows you to create things such as:

  • Trample units and freeze them for x turns.
  • Spend x mana to self detonate at the end of the turn, destroying all nearby units.
  • Charge for x turns and then unleash a storm of magic missiles, destroying all units in a forward line.
  • When your unit is overtaken, stun its attacker for x turns.
  • Spend x mana to unfreeze your allies and destroy all frozen enemy units.
  • When overtaking an enemy, become immune to magic attacks for x turns.

Win conditions

You can also create custom win conditions, currently following a chess style format, such as:

  • Capture the king. Take out the enemy king to win the match.
  • Four Pawns To Victory. Take out 4 or more pawns to win.
  • Cold business. Freeze x enemies to win.

Anything else i should know about?

In future versions, if needed, we might introduce cosmetics to allow us to pay for maintenance and server costs. However, the game is playable offline in the practice (vs AI) and hotseat (vs other player) game modes.
